issue.title: std::min() and max() requirements overly restrictive

discussion.p: The requirements in 25.3.7, p1 and 4 call for T to satisfy the requirements of LessThanComparable () and CopyConstructible (). Since the functions take and return their arguments and result by const reference, I believe the CopyConstructible requirement is unnecessary.
